Title: Elementary exact calculations of degree growth and entropy for discrete equations
Source: Proc. R. Soc. A Math. Phys. Eng. Sci.
Abstract: © 2017 The Author(s) Published by the Royal Society. All rights reserved.Second-order discrete equations are studied over the field of rational functions C(z), where z is a variable not appearing in the equation. The exact degree of each iterate as a function of z can be calculated easily using the standard calculations that arise in singularity confinement analysis, even when the singularities are not confined. This produces elementary yet rigorous entropy calculations.
